titles.title: My Soul, Be on Thy Guard

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My soul, be on thy guard, Ten thousand foes arise; The hosts of sin are pressing hard To draw thee from the skies.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: Ne'er think the vict'ry won, Nor lay thine armor down; The work of faith will not be done Till thou obtain the crown.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Fight on, my soul, till death Shall bring thee to thy God; He'll take thee, at thy parting breath, To His divine abode.
